paragraphs: Our department is dedicated to training you for educational leadership while also allowing you to fit going to college into your busy schedule. To that end, all of our degree programs and certification plans are offered totally online on an eight-by-five schedule: eight-week blocks, five times per year.
Academic Advising CertificateThe online Academic Advising Certificate will prepare you to start or advance your career as an academic advisor on college or university campuses.
Mental Health and Wellness Counseling – Online LPC BridgePrepare for licensure as a licensed professional  counselor (LPC) in Texas.
School Counseling – Online LPC BridgePrepare for licensure as a licensed professional counselor (LPC) in Texas.
Texas Principal CertificationThe online Texas Principal Certification program is aligned with Texas principal standards and prepares you for leadership in K-12 education.
Texas School Counselor CertificationThe online Texas School Counselor Certification program prepares qualified applicants to take the TExES exam to become a school counselor in Texas.
Texas Superintendent CertificationThe online Texas Superintendent Certification program prepares qualified applicants for the TExES exam to be a superintendent of schools in Texas.
Texas Teacher CertificationThe online Texas Teacher Certification program will prepare you to take the TExES exam to become a middle school or high school teacher in Texas.
Class of 1995, Education
Oct 18
Aug 16

Educating the next generation of students is an important and rewarding career choice. We applaud you for your dedication, and we are here to help you advance in your chosen field of education. We also understand that you are incredibly busy, so we offer flexible online degree programs to help you achieve your educational goals within your schedule and budget.
Take a look at some other aspects of our department that make ASU an outstanding place to study curriculum and instruction.
All of our course content is available online through the Blackboard software program. You can get homework assignments and complete readings, as well as interact with your classmates and professors.
All of our degree programs and classes utilize OERs to ease the strain on your budget. OERs are course materials that are available at no charge (FREE!) for teaching, learning and research.

You also have access to our new Innovative Teaching Center, a classroom outfitted with the same state-of-the-art technology and equipment that teachers and administrators are likely to use when they start their careers.
ACADEMIC PROGRAMS
ACADEMIC CALENDAR
FINANCIAL AID AND SCHOLARSHIPS

If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
